# f5distributedcloud_gcp_vpc_site (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_gcp_vpc_site` resource manages GCP VPC Sites in F5 Distributed Cloud.

GCP VPC Sites deploy F5 XC nodes into an existing or new GCP VPC network.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_gcp_vpc_site" "example" {
  name                  = "gcp-site-1"
  namespace             = "system"
  gcp_region            = "us-west1"
  project_id            = "my-gcp-project"
  network_name          = "my-vpc-network"
  machine_type          = "n1-standard-4"
  cloud_credentials_ref = "gcp-creds"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cloud_credentials_ref` (String) Reference to cloud credentials.
- `gcp_region` (String) GCP region for the site.
- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)
- `project_id` (String) GCP project ID.

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `machine_type` (String) GCP VM machine type for site nodes.
- `network_name` (String) GCP VPC network name.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
